item.description:
The Boston University Women's Resource Center, in coordination with the LGBTQ Ministry of Marsh Chapel, presents a screening of the award-winning documentary "For the Bible Tells Me So.” The film, directed by Daniel G. Karslake, explores homosexuality and its perceived conflict with religion, as well as the varied interpretations of the Bible's view on same-sex marriage. The screening will be followed by a discussion about homosexuality and religion.

For more information and to RSVP: http://www.facebook.c....

Information about the movie can be found at http://www.forthebibl....
item.name: Screening: “For the Bible Tells Me So”
